Mobile Authenticator App

Set Up Authenticator

  1. Get the Authenticator app from the App Store
  2. Open the app and clck Begin
  3. Tap Scan a Bardcode
  4. Give camera permissions and allow Authenticator to take pictures
  5. Scan the code below with your mobile device

Can't scan the QR code?

Try the manual setup

  1. Get the Authenticator app from the App Store
  2. Open the app and click Begin Setup
  3. Select "Enter a provided key"
  4. Use your mySherwinID in the Account Name field
  5. Copy and paste this Key XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX in your Key Field
  6. Tap "Add"
